title: [BUG] .Net MAUI 9.0  Windows platform application crashes when using the SKGLView control
body:
### Description

dotNet 9.0 Maui application using SKGLView throw System.ExecutionEngineException
  HResult=0x80131506

Call stack screenshot
![屏幕截图 2024-12-12 132156](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8eeccbe1-745e-492c-8959-d68a1a47360c)

comments.author: TommiGustafsson-HMP
comments.body:
Please use packaged mode. .NET 9 defaults to unpackaged.

Here's the issue about this problem: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/2968

Essentially, you need `<WindowsPackageType>MSIX</WindowsPackageType>` in csproj and `"commandName": "MsixPackage"` in launchSettings.json.

comments.author: wzy9089
comments.body: Problem solved, thank you very much！:)
